paramInformation.label: Relock Time
paramInformation.description: Time lock stays unlocked before automatically re-locking

metadata.inclusion:
1. Touch Keypad with palm.
2. Enter User Code (Normal Mode only. Enter Master Code if operating Master Mode).
3. Press 'I' button [Registration] from the inside of battery cover. 
4. Press 9, #, 1, # by sequence on the keypad (to Add).
5. Wait until "Ding dong dang" melody play, then press 'I' button [Registration] from the inside of battery cover
metadata.exclusion:
1. Touch Keypad with palm.
2. Enter User Code (Normal Mode only. Enter Master Code if operating Master Mode).
3. Press 'I' button [Registration] from the inside of battery cover. 
4. Press 9, #, 3, # on the keypad by sequence (to Delete).
5. Enter User Code (Normal Mode only. Enter Master Code if operating Master Mode), then press #.
6. Wait until "Ding dong dang" melody play, then press 'I' button [Registration] from the inside of battery cover
metadata.reset: This product has no function to go back to the factory default
